bug.author: TobyRoseman
bug.description: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apple/turicreate/blob/master/src/unity/python/turicreate/toolkits/recommender/util.py>src/unity/python/turicreate/toolkits/recommender/util.py</denchmark-link> contains several references to . However this object is never defined. I suspect we may no longer need the functions which use _pp. We should either remove the code which uses _pp or define _pp.
